params.contestantDepositAmount: The amount each contestant must deposit
params.demandSensitivity: LMSR demand sensitivity in basis points
params.expiry: The expiration timestamp for the contest
params.liquidityParameter: LMSR liquidity parameter for spectator predictions
params.oracle: The address that will control the contest
params.oracleFee: The fee percentage for the oracle (in basis points, max 1000 = 10%)
params.paymentToken: The ERC20 token used for deposits (typically PlatformToken/CUT)
params.prizeShareBps: Portion of spectator deposit going to prize pool (e.g., 750 = 7.5%)
params.userShareBps: Portion of spectator deposit going to contestant bonuses (e.g., 750 = 7.5%)

returns._0: The address of the newly created Contest contract  Note: paymentToken is typically the PlatformToken (CUT) address  Requirements: - paymentToken must not be zero address - oracle must not be zero address - contestantDepositAmount must be greater than 0 - expiry must be in the future - prizeShareBps + userShareBps must not exceed 100%  Emits a {ContestCreated} event

contestHost(address).notice: Mapping to track which address created each contest

contests(uint256).notice: Array of all created contest contract addresses

getContestCount().notice: Get total number of contests created
